messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] computer mystery, was homeschooling mystery
messages.msgSnippet: I have no idea, Lynda. Does anyone know where to go to change the settings regarding cut & paste? When I do that, I get these HUGE sized types. I can t stumble
messages.messageBody:
I have no idea, Lynda. Does anyone know where to go to change the settings regarding cut & paste? When I do that, I get these HUGE sized types. I can't stumble upon where that choice is made.
Sarah

messages.msgSnippet: O.K., curiosity and the cat thing here.  How come some posts arrive in their original state looking like they are a forward or an answer?  I mean the little
messages.messageBody:
O.K., curiosity and the cat thing here. How come some posts arrive in their
original state looking like they are a forward or an answer? I mean the
little ">>" things.

Lynda
